title: Salesforce Einstein Product Offerings
description: Explore Salesforce Einstein's AI-powered tools, enhancing productivity, decision-making, and customer experience across Salesforce platforms.

sections.title: Sales Cloud Einstein
content: Predict the likelihood of lead conversion with AI-driven insights.
Score opportunities based on their likelihood to close.

sections.title: Service Cloud Einstein
content: Automate service tasks with intelligent chatbots.
- Provide instant responses to common queries.
Use AI to classify and route service cases efficiently.

sections.title: Marketing Cloud Einstein
content: Tailor campaigns based on engagement predictions.
- Predict email, SMS, and push engagement.

sections.title: Commerce Cloud Einstein
content: Offer personalized product suggestions to customers.
- Tailor suggestions based on browsing behavior.
